attributes.title: Obama 2020🤟🏼🦆
attributes.review: I think the Obama app is wayyyyy better than tr- tru- I cant even say his name but he’s orange and I hope Barrón trump gets to play roblox again and hopefully the simsons were right oh and if y’all are seeing this I love you for leaving a 1 star review😙

attributes.title: BLM inc.
attributes.review: i didn’t like this app, it was the biggest waste of time in my entire life(not exaggerating).it takes forever to load and glitches so much,i don’t recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: AWEFUL!!
attributes.review: the only thing the app showed was an orange man with a big mouth. did not enjoy at all and it wasn’t even entertaining. i would not recommend this app to anyone. bad energy, bad vibes, no fun. please don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: Horrible terrible app
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and made my screen freeze. I had to take it to an apple store and had to buy a new phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. I would give it zero stars if I could.

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: Got the app to see what these racist homophobic misogamists did with it- terrible job. Honestly a 4 year old could make a better app than this, and could probably run a better campaign

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: Once I downloaded It (which took ONE HOUR). The app started to glitch left and right. I think something is wrong with the application. I just cant and work the app without it glitching.

attributes.title: Glitchy app
attributes.review: Just downloaded this to see what our greaat president is doing with his campaign. Made my phone extremely glitchy and made the world 20x worse. 😩Do not download this useless app!! My phone exploded in anger!!! 🤬

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch. At one point it made it completely shut off and I couldn’t use it for a day. This app needs to be taken down.

attributes.title: Worst app i ever downloaded
attributes.review: This take ages to download and. For  example it the speed of a sloth or a snail. Also it take like 10 minutes to get in to the app. It was glitching out like crazy. Get rid of it. This is trash.

attributes.title: This App
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst app I have ever used. First off, when I tried opening it, I got jumped by dogs. When I finally got my Tv treated, I opened it again and was greeted by it uninstalling from my phone. WORST APP!
